pageContext.claim: “So sad to see that New York City and State are falling apart. All they want to do is investigate to make me hate them even more than I should. Governor Cuomo has lost control, and lost his mind. Very bad for the homeless and all!”
pageContext.analysis: New York state started investigating the Trump Foundation following a Washington Post investigation. The New York attorney general said the board of the Trump Foundation had not met since 1999. And without any outside supervision, the foundation came to serve the spending needs of Trump — and then, in 2016, the needs of his presidential campaign. Despite his pledge not to settle, Trump settled the case and shut down the foundation.
